DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate clinical efficacy safety PASCAL laser ( PAttern SCAn Laser ) diabetic retinopathy . Patients proliferative severe nonproliferative retinopathy treat panretinal photocoagulation utilize different treatment strategy . The investigator believe use `` low '' laser parameter , clinical response may equivalent less adverse effect .
DOC.brief_title: Panretinal Photocoagulation Diabetic Retinopathy With PASCAL Laser
DOC.criteria: proliferative severe nonproliferative diabetic retinopathy ( type 1 type 2 ) best correct visual acuity 20/50 good capability read follow instruction capability sign consignment term best correct visual acuity bad 20/50 significant macular edema responsible visual acuity lower 20/50 medium opacity ( include vitreous hemorrhage visual axis , reabsorb inferior vitreous hemorrhage ) previous laser treatment ( PRP , focal macular grid ) glaucoma ( confirm suspicious ) diseases retina optic nerve previous ocular surgery last 6 month impossibility obtain good quality image retinography , angiography OCT
